availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Susan Oliver. Father of George W. Oliver. Married to Catharine Oliver. Father of Sarah E. Oliver and Andrew T. Oliver. Farmer in Trigg County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 321; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 50; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Congressional District 1, Lyon County, 1863, p. 13; KYR-0001-029-0538.
